casebody.data:
James R. CRIDER, Sr. and wife, Kathy Crider
v.
John Vincent CATTIE, M.D. No. 197P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Steven C. Lawrence, Fayetteville, for Crider, James R. (Sr.), et al. Jeffery Kent Carpenter, for Crider, James R. (Sr.). Scott M. Stevenson, Charlotte, for Cattie, John Vincent (M.D.). Karen H. Stiles, Charlotte, for Cattie, John Vincent (M.D.). Scott A. Hefner. Stacey E. Tally, Fayetteville, for Crider, James R. (Sr.). Jacob Stump, Charlotte, for Cattie, John Vincent (M.D.).

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of June 2015 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
